comments:
for a xml file like this:

<html>
<head>
<base />
<meta />
</head>
<body>
hello world
</body>
</html>

Open this file, and change the view to Outline Page, select "body" node,
and press "shift" key, and try to select "meta" node, it will throw an
exception like:

!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.views".
!STACK 0
